attributes.action: Move the Cougars in to Sardis Rd and make it our 'centre of excellence'.
attributes.additional_details: We won the league last year and they didn't
attributes.background:
We are supposed to be the best team in Wales but this weekend everyone was saying it was a really good day going to watch the Outlaws play at Sardis Road AND ITS NOT FAIR!!! 

People should be looking at us because we were pink.
